entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 4:08 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening and ending later this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
